title: Please, I Really Didn’t Want To Fall in Love With My Master! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Master   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Master-Servant Relationship   Misunderstandings   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests   Student-Teacher Relationship   System Administrator   Tsundere   Unique Cultivation Technique   Younger Love Interests
author: 网友小张
description:
Li Ran traversed to another world and became the Holy Son of a Demon Way Sect.

The system has awakened, and the first task released is actually to fall in love?

The Sect strictly forbids relationships between men and women. 

Li Ran took the risk of being expelled from the Sect and wrote a love letter to his junior sister, but it was sent to the master by mistake!
>
